memberdef.name: add_audio_route_to_stack

briefdescription.para: Adds a new audio route.

simplesect.para: true if successful, false if not

memberdef.name: add_control_route_to_stack

briefdescription.para: Adds a control route.

simplesect.para: true if successful, false if not

briefdescription.para: Initializes the pedal object with default debug level (just warnings and errors)
Initializes the pedal object with user defined debug level.

parameterdescription.para: The debug level to display (MSG_DEBUG, MSG_INFO, MSG_WARN, MSG_ERROR)

briefdescription.para: Initializes the pedal object with used defined debug level, bypasses DSP reset.

parameterdescription.para: The debug level to display (MSG_DEBUG, MSG_INFO, MSG_WARN, MSG_ERROR)
The dsp no reset (set to true to bypass reset)

inbodydescription.para: Next check to see if we need to do a firmware update

briefdescription.para: Runs the current canvas (i.e. compiles and downloads to the DSP)

simplesect.para: True if successful, false if not

briefdescription.para: Pedal service function that should be called in the Arduino loop() function.
Routes a source node (output) to a destination mode (input)

simplesect.para: True is successful, false if not

briefdescription.para: Route a control source node (output) to a destination mode (input)

parameterdescription.para: The source node (should be an output)
The destination node (should be an input)

simplesect.para: True is successful, false if not

briefdescription.para: Route a control source node (output) to a destination mode (input)

parameterdescription.para: The source node (should be an output)
The destination node (should be an input)
The scale to apply to the control value
The offset to apply to the control value

simplesect.para: True is successful, false if not

briefdescription.para: Set one of the footswitches to be a bypass button.

detaileddescription.para: This function will also set the corresponding LED to turn on and off when bypass is disabled / enabled.

briefdescription.para: Set one of the footswitches to be a tap tempo / length button.

parameterdescription.para: Set the corresponding LED to flash at tempo rate

briefdescription.para: Returns true when a new tap interval has been tapped in by the user.
Returns the current tap interval in milliseconds.
Returns the current tap interval in Hertz (cycles / second)
Sets the LED blink rate for tap interval.

detaileddescription.para: Use this if there is a pot that can also change the tempo / rate / duration to override what has been previously "tapped" in.

parameterdescription.para: The new blink rate in Hertz

briefdescription.para: Sets the LED blink rate for tap interval with LED control.

detaileddescription.para: Use this if there is a pot that can also change the tempo / rate / duration to override what has been previously "tapped" in.

parameterdescription.para: The new blink rate in Hertz

briefdescription.para: Sets the LED blink rate in milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para: Use this if there is a pot that can also change the tempo / rate / duration to override what has been previously "tapped" in.

briefdescription.para: Sets the LED blink rate for tap interval with LED control.

detaileddescription.para: Use this if there is a pot that can also change the tempo / rate / duration to override what has been previously "tapped" in.

parameterdescription.para: The new blink period in milliseconds

briefdescription.para: Checks if a button was just pressed and optionally turns on an LED when it is.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to create events when a button is held down and released to momentarily enable / disable functionality.

parameterdescription.para: If true, lights LED while button pressed

simplesect.para: true if button is pressed, false if not

briefdescription.para: Checks if a button was just released and optionally turns off an LED when it was.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to create events when a button is held down and released to momentarily enable / disable functionality.

parameterdescription.para: If true, turns off the LED when button is released

briefdescription.para: Utility function to print the instance stack to the console.
Utility function to print the routing table to the console.
Utility function to print the parameter tables.
This class describes an effects canvas.
